db_title: Meta’s Favorite Product Isn’t AI. It’s the Copy Button. – On my Om.pdf

extracted_metadata.title: Meta's Favorite Product Isn't AI. It's the Copy Button.
extracted_metadata.author: OM
extracted_metadata.subject: AI and personal super intelligence
extracted_metadata.summary: The article discusses the emergence of personal superintelligence, emphasizing Meta's commitment to bringing personalized AI to everyone. It criticizes Mark Zuckerberg for appropriating the term 'personal super intelligence' from Character.AI's CEO, Noam Shazeer, highlighting the ongoing intellectual property concerns in the tech industry.

text_sample:
